history.proof: intros b a H. induction H. - reflexivity. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, m : nat H : a <= m IHle : sumToN a <= sumToN m Unable to unify "?M1438 + ?M1440 <= ?M1439 + ?M1441" with "sumToN a <= S (m + sumToN m)".

original: intros b a H. induction H. - reflexivity. - simpl. apply Nat.add_le_mono. apply IHle.
